Title: Variable and Full of Perturbation
Writer: Graeme Manson (created by), John Fawcett (created by), Karen Walton, Tony Elliott (executive story editor), Chris Roberts (story editor), Alexandra Mircheff (story coordinator), Elize Morgan (developed with the participation of: Canadian Film Centre story editor resident), Peter Rowley (developed with the participation of: Canadian Film Centre story editor resident), Andrew De Angelis (developed with the participation of: Canadian Film Centre story editor resident), Kim Coghill (developed with the participation of: Canadian Film Centre story editor resident), Jeff Detsky (developed with the participation of: Canadian Film Centre story editor resident), Adam Higgs (developed with the participation of: Canadian Film Centre story editor resident), Alex Levine (developed with the participation of: Canadian Film Centre story editor resident), Rebecca Sernasie (developed with the participation of: Canadian Film Centre story editor resident), Bob Mackowycz Jr. (developed with the participation of: Canadian Film Centre story editor resident)
Actors: Tatiana Maslany, Dylan Bruce, Jordan Gavaris, Kevin Hanchard
Plot: A new player in the clone conspiracy turns up at Felix's door, sending him into crisis mode. With Cosima running out of options, Sarah struggles with the decision to surrender a crucial piece of leverage and make a deal with DYAD.
